We need permissions:\n - to read SMS; %s.\nPlease click OK and grant permissions in the following pop-ups.
\n - access the phone;
Please enable Enaza Music accessibility service

We need this service to receive responses from USSD commands.

Please:
1. Click OK and you will be redirected to the accessibility services window.
2. Please turn on the Enaza Music service 
3. And go back to the application.
Thank you! Service is enabled now
This service helps to get the results of USSD calls
It is necessary to enable USSD accessibility service

Please allow installing apps from our app

It is necessary to install updates of our application.

Please:
1. Click OK and you will be redirected to the Install unknown apps window.
2. Please allow installing from this source.
3. And go back to the application.
